    • validateData

      private boolean validateData()
      This method validates that each data field necessary has the required and correct data type
      Returns:
      false if any test is invalid, else true

    • validateCourse

      private boolean validateCourse()
      This function validates the class name. If nothing is selected, then it will prompt the user to select a class name.
      Returns:
      false is nothing is selected, else return true

    • validateDates

      private boolean validateDates()
      This function validate that at least 1 of the day of the week is selected. If not then it will prompt the user to click on at least 1 or more day/days of the week.
      Returns:
      false is nothing is selected, else return true

    • validateProfessor

      private boolean validateProfessor()
      This function validate that at least 1 of the day of the week is selected. If not then it will prompt the user to click on at least 1 or more day/days of the week.
      Returns:
      false is nothing is selected, else return true

    • validateRoom

      private boolean validateRoom()
      This function validate that at least 1 of the day of the week is selected. If not then it will prompt the user to click on at least 1 or more day/days of the week.
      Returns:
      false is nothing is selected, else return true
